attributes.action: increase cold weather payments,one off payment like oaps get in december for heating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see an increase in cold weather payments,possibly a one of payment maybe in november/december like the oaps get,i am on income support myself an d am finding it very hard this week as i have put in £50 in my gas meter for heating on low this week,it is ridiculous as i know that some oaps dont even pay for fuel as they get coal for nothing anyway and they still recieve the £400 payment,what about us families with young children etc on low incomes,also pay the money asap,not let the weather be cold for 7 days in a row it is ridiculous,  to send cold payments after the weather has been cold,you need to sit and rethink this through as i am sure there are a lot more people out there that agree with me,please respond asap,susan evans
